text: Chatzꞌibꞌaj we tzij riꞌ che ri ángel pa ri komontyox pa Filadelfia: Are waꞌ ri kubꞌij ri qas tzij ralkꞌwaꞌl ri Dios, in kabꞌan we puꞌwiꞌ ri ajawarem rech ri David.3:7 Chawila pa Isaías 22:20-22. Are kinjaq jun uchiꞌ ja man kꞌo ta jun kakwinik katzꞌapinik, xuqujeꞌ are kintzꞌapij man kꞌo ta jun kakwinik kujaqo. Chanim chatatabꞌej ri kinbꞌij chawe:
